attributes.action: Allow UK house prices to fall to a sustainable level.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the British goverment to allow British housing to return to a sustainable level. 

We the First time buyer would not like home equity loans to purchase our first home, as these loans only slow down the fall in the market, and tempt younger buyers into a falling market

We would like the opportunity to purchase a home at a reasonable capital cost.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
